translator_guide_0: This section provides guidance to translators, offering insights into internal details:
translator_guide_1: 1. Some lang lines have corresponding locale context, particularly the formatter lines. Understanding these contexts helps translators comprehend how the lang line function. Translating these lines is unnecessary.
translator_guide_2: 2. Certain lines contain line break format(\n). translator can add/remove that format at will based on the actual length of the translated text.

Usable Value of the stat. This is used for stuff like Armor to turn it into % damage reduction. 
the higher level your target, the more value you need to protect against it.

mmorpg.profession.desc.alchemy: Alchemy is a crafting profession that turns materials from gathering professions into Potions.
mmorpg.profession.desc.cooking: Cooking is a crafting profession that turns materials from gathering professions into foods that can provide stat buffs.
mmorpg.profession.desc.enchanting: Infusing is a crafting profession that turns materials from gathering professions into scrolls that can infuse extra power into your gear.
mmorpg.profession.desc.farming: Farming gives you a chance to obtain extra custom materials by chopping wheat, potatoes and so on. You can see what gives experience in the Mine and Slash HUB > Library screen.
mmorpg.profession.desc.fishing: Fishing gives you a chance to obtain extra custom materials by fishing.
mmorpg.profession.desc.gear_crafting: Gear Crafting is a crafting profession that turns materials from gathering professions into new pieces of gear.
mmorpg.profession.desc.husbandry: Animal Breeding gives you a chance to obtain extra custom materials by breeding animals.
mmorpg.profession.desc.mining: Mining gives you chance to obtain extra custom materials by mining ores. You can see which ores give experience in the Mine and Slash HUB > Library screen.
mmorpg.profession.desc.salvaging: Salvaging is the process of turning junk loot into useful materials in the Salvaging Station. You can only salvage Gear with Mine and Slash souls and other Mine and Slash rarity items.

mmorpg.stat_desc.accuracy: Increases your chance to hit, low accuracy also causes crits to fail. Specifically it decreases opponent's chance to dodge

mmorpg.ailment.desc.bleed: Deals 120% of the damage as §6☀ Physical§7§9 Damage for 5s.
mmorpg.ailment.desc.burn: Deals 100% of the damage as §c☀ Fire§7§9 Damage for 3s.
mmorpg.ailment.desc.electrify: Accumulates 100% of the damage which can be activated with SHOCK to deal bonus §e☀ Lightning§7§9 Damage
mmorpg.ailment.desc.freeze: Slows Enemy and Accumulates 85% of the damage which can be activated with SHATTER to deal bonus §b☀ Cold§7§9 Damage
mmorpg.ailment.desc.poison: Deals 150% of the damage as §5☀ Chaos§7§9 Damage for 10s.
mmorpg.effect.desc.thorn: Attacking an enemy with Thorns consumes the thorns to deal [calc:thorn_bush] §6☀ Physical§7 Damage
mmorpg.uber_map.desc.uber1: A living mortal, in MY Realm?
